city.cs.engine.DynamicBody

game.Enemy

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class Enemy extends city.cs.engine.Walker implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
class to define enemies

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(city.cs.engine.World world, city.cs.engine.Shape shape, int health, float speed, Player player)
      initialises enemy
      Parameters:
      world - reference to world they are created in
      shape - reference to shape of enemy
      health - int value of health stat
      speed - float value of speed of which they can move
      player - reference to the player they target in world

  • Method Details

    • moveTowards

      public void moveTowards()
      moves the enemy towards to player

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      decreases health amount based on damage dealt by player and destroys enemy once health is 0
      Parameters:
      damage - reference to damage value dealt by player in the attack method in player

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      allows access to health stat used when painting health bar in game view
      Returns:
      int value of health

    • getHealthBarPosition

      public org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getHealthBarPosition()
      gets position above enemy body
      Returns:
      a Vec2 position above the enemy

    • setPlayerInRange

      public void setPlayerInRange(boolean playerInRange)
      sets if the player is in range of the enemy
      Parameters:
      playerInRange - boolean which controls wether the player is in range or not

    • isPlayerInRange

      public boolean isPlayerInRange()
      checks if the player is in range
      Returns:
      if player is in range
